member.name: M:AtEase.Extensions.ArrayExtensions.IsNullOrEmpty(System.Array)
member.summary: Determines whether a collection is null or has no elements without having to enumerate the entire collection to get a count. Uses LINQ.
member.returns: true if this list is null or empty; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:AtEase.Extensions.Collections.EnumerableExtensions.IsNullOrEmpty``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary: Determines whether a collection is null or has no elements without having to enumerate the entire collection to get a count. Uses LINQ.
member.returns: true if this list is null or empty; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:AtEase.Extensions.Collections.ListExtensions.IsNullOrEmpty``1(System.Collections.Generic.IList{``0})
member.summary: Determines whether a collection is null or has no elements without having to enumerate the entire collection to get a count. Uses LINQ.
member.returns: true if this list is null or empty; otherwise, false.
